description: This trap should be sent whenever the one way jitter
on a CFM test will surpass one of the 2 defined thresholds.

Summary.eval: ($v1>$v3) ? 'The one-way jitter on a CFM test has surpassed error threshold ($v3 ms)' : 'The one-way jitter on a CFM test has surpassed warning threshold ($v2 ms)'

description: One way jitter calculated for a specific remote MEP in milliseconds
variables.name: PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProcessResultOneWayJitter

description: Specifies one-way jitter warning values to monitor in milliseconds.
variables.name: PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfile1wJitterWarning

description: Specifies one-way jitter error values to monitor in milliseconds.
variables.name: PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfile1wJitterError

description: This trap should be sent whenever the two way jitter
on a CFM test will surpass one of the 2 defined thresholds.

Summary.eval: ($v1>$v4) ? 'The two-way jitter on a CFM test has surpassed the error threshold' : 'The two-way jitter on a CFM test has surpassed the warning threshold'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmJitterThreshold PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProcessResultTwoWayJitter u 9999 PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfileJitterWarning u 9999 PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfileJitterWarningPeriod u 9999 PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfileJitterError u 9999 PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfileJitterErrorPeriod u 9999

description: Two way jitter calculated for a specific remote MEP in milliseconds
variables.name: PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProcessResultTwoWayJitter

description: Specifies round-trip jitter warning values
to monitor in milliseconds. If set value is greater than the
jitter-error it means that the warning is disabled.
variables.name: PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfileJitterWarning

description: Specifies the duration jitter occurs in seconds.
variables.name: PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfileJitterWarningPeriod

description: Specifies round-trip jitter error values to monitor in milliseconds.
variables.name: PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfileJitterError

description: Specifies the duration jitter occurs in seconds.
variables.name: PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfileJitterErrorPeriod

description: This trap should be sent whenever the frame loss
on a CFM test will surpass one of the 2 defined
thresholds.

Summary.eval: ($v1>$v3) ? 'The frame-loss on a CFM test has surpassed the error threshold' : 'The frame-loss on a CFM test has surpassed the warning threshold'

description: Two way frameloss calculated for a specific remote MEP
in units of hundredths of percent.
Note: When prvtCfmProcessResultFrameloss has value of 10000, all the values of
prvtCfmProcessResultOneWayJitter, prvtCfmProcessResultTwoWayJitter and
prvtCfmProcessResultLatency are irrelevant.
variables.name: PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProcessResultFrameloss

description: Specifies round-trip frame-loss warning
values to monitor. The default is frame-loss
of 8% is reported. If set value is greater
than the frame-loss-error it means
that the warning is disable.
variables.name: PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfileFrameLossWarning

description: Specifies round-trip frame-loss error
values to monitor. The default is
frame-loss of 10% is reported.
variables.name: PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfileFrameLossError

description: This trap should be sent whenever the latency
on a CFM test will surpass one of the 2 defined
thresholds.

Summary.eval: ($v1>$v4) ? 'The latency on a CFM test has surpassed the error threshold' : 'The latency on a CFM test has surpassed the warning threshold'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmLatencyThreshold PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProcessResultLatency u 9999 PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfileLatencyWarning u 9999 PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfileLatencyWarningPeriod u 9999 PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfileLatencyError u 9999 PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfileLatencyErrorPeriod u 9999

description: Two way latency calculated for a specific remote MEP
in milliseconds
variables.name: PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProcessResultLatency

description: Specifies round-trip latency error values to
monitor in milliseconds. If set value is greater than the
latency-error it means that the warning is disabled.
variables.name: PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfileLatencyWarning

description: Specifies the duration latency increase occurs in seconds.
variables.name: PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfileLatencyWarningPeriod

description: Specifies round-trip latency error values to monitor in milliseconds.
variables.name: PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfileLatencyError

description: Specifies the duration latency increase occurs in seconds.
variables.name: PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmProfileLatencyErrorPeriod

description: This trap is issued whenever an AIS condition with specified lifetime on a MEP is met.

event.Summary: An AIS condition with specified lifetime on a MEP was met: $v1

description: The lifetime of the last received AIS packet.
During an interval equal to 3.5 times the AIS transmission period indicated
in the AIS frames received earlier, the MEP does not receive AIS frames.
The value is valid (non-zero) if AIS packets are being received.
variables.name: PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmMepAisLifetime

description: This trap is issued whenever an LCK condition with specified lifetime on a MEP is met.

event.Summary: An LCK condition with specified lifetime on a MEP was met: $v1

description: The lifetime of the last received LCK packet.
During an interval equal to 3.5 times the LCK transmission period indicated
in the LCK frames received earlier, the MEP does not receive LCK frames.
The value is valid (non-zero) if AIS packets are being received.
variables.name: PRVT-CFM-MIB::prvtCfmMepLckLifetime
